FuncDef: The display bfd interface command displays information about BFD interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface that is enabled with BFD.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To obtain the interfaces to which BFD sessions are bound or view the status of BFD sessions bound to a specified interface, run the display bfd interface command.
Only BFD session for IP binding to an interface is supported.
